com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.binder

Class DynamicRecyclerViewBinder<T extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.binder.DynamicRecyclerViewBinder<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicInfoBigBinder, DynamicInfoBinder, DynamicItemBinder

    public abstract class DynamicRecyclerViewBinder<T extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
extends Object
    A data binder class to bind data with the view inside the DynamicBinderAdapter. Extend this class to implement your own data binding logic.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor to initialize an object of this class.
